info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:01PM EDT until July 04 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TRANSYLVANIA AND WEST CENTRAL HENDERSON COUNTIES... At 300 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Brevard, or 4 miles south of Mount Pisgah, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Graveyard Fields, Mount Pisgah, Looking Glass, Forge Mountain, North Transylvania, Connestee, Penrose, Etowah and Mills River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
